Posts.Content: Ni Roz...I am new to this site however, I am a six year survivor or breast cancer and survived taking Arimidex for five years. At the end of five, I was ready to be off, having experienced many side effects -  most significantly joint and muscle pain, stiffness, and fatigue. By the end, I was also struggling with depression...I did not have to do radiation nor other chemo for which I am glad but it was difficult
Posts.Title: Side Effects of Arimidex After Almost 2 Years
